code: /* eslint-disable no-param-reassign */import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var userInputSlice=createSlice({name:'userInput',initialState:{hourlyWage:0,hoursWorking:0,livingCosts:0},reducers:{updateUserHourlyWage:function updateUserHourlyWage(state,action){var hourlyWage=action.payload.hourlyWage;state.hourlyWage=hourlyWage;},updateUserHoursWorking:function updateUserHoursWorking(state,action){var hoursWorking=action.payload.hoursWorking;state.hoursWorking=hoursWorking;},updateUserLivingCosts:function updateUserLivingCosts(state,action){var livingCosts=action.payload.livingCosts;state.livingCosts=livingCosts;}}});var _userInputSlice$actio=userInputSlice.actions,updateUserHourlyWage=_userInputSlice$actio.updateUserHourlyWage,updateUserHoursWorking=_userInputSlice$actio.updateUserHoursWorking,updateUserLivingCosts=_userInputSlice$actio.updateUserLivingCosts;export{updateUserHourlyWage,updateUserHoursWorking,updateUserLivingCosts};export default userInputSlice.reducer;export var selectUserHourlyWage=function selectUserHourlyWage(state){return state.userInputSlice.hourlyWage;};export var selectUserHoursWorking=function selectUserHoursWorking(state){return state.userInputSlice.hoursWorking;};export var selectUserLivingCosts=function selectUserLivingCosts(state){return state.userInputSlice.livingCosts;};
